class.name: Container
class.brief_description: Base class for all GUI containers.
class.description: Base class for all GUI containers. A [Container] automatically arranges its child controls in a certain way. This class can be inherited to make custom container types.

method.name: _get_allowed_size_flags_horizontal
method.description: Implement to return a list of allowed horizontal [enum Control.SizeFlags] for child nodes. This doesn't technically prevent the usages of any other size flags, if your implementation requires that. This only limits the options available to the user in the Inspector dock. [b]Note:[/b] Having no size flags is equal to having [constant Control.SIZE_SHRINK_BEGIN]. As such, this value is always implicitly allowed.

method.name: _get_allowed_size_flags_vertical
method.description: Implement to return a list of allowed vertical [enum Control.SizeFlags] for child nodes. This doesn't technically prevent the usages of any other size flags, if your implementation requires that. This only limits the options available to the user in the Inspector dock. [b]Note:[/b] Having no size flags is equal to having [constant Control.SIZE_SHRINK_BEGIN]. As such, this value is always implicitly allowed.

method.name: fit_child_in_rect
method.description: Fit a child control in a given rect. This is mainly a helper for creating custom container classes.

method.name: queue_sort
method.description: Queue resort of the contained children. This is called automatically anyway, but can be called upon request.

signal.name: pre_sort_children
signal.description: Emitted when children are going to be sorted.

signal.name: sort_children
signal.description: Emitted when sorting the children is needed.

constants.constant: Notification just before children are going to be sorted, in case there's something to process beforehand.
Notification for when sorting the children, it must be obeyed immediately.
